title: Multiple Disorder
description: When Dean Williams lost his fiancée, her death left him with more questions than answers. Mainly, why was her body never found? After a manila folder lands in the hands of Dean’s best friend and high profile lawyer Max O’Brian, filled with curious new information, the two set out to bring some closure to this long overdue mystery. But they’re not the only ones looking for answers. When their pursuit puts their lives in danger, it will take all their cunning and wit to make it out alive. Newly released from Baybrooke Asylum, Kathryn Daniels may have been able to convince the staff she was functioning normally, but that doesn’t stop Them for invading her every waking moment. Suffering from Dissociative Identity Disorder, she is slipping out of reality and soon, she’s won’t be able to keep control. But before that happens, she needs to find the one person who can lead her to the truth: Dean Williams.
author: Kori Bates
